channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: After The Storm
channel.desc: Comedy, Drama 2016 A debt-ridden private detective, haunted by his failures as a father and husband, fights to mend his broken family while grappling with the consequences of his gambling addiction. Hirokazu Koreeda, Hiroshi Abe, Yoko Maki, Satomi Kobayashi, Lily Franky, S?suke Ikematsu, Hirokazu Koreeda.
